com.nttdocomo.util
Interface TimeKeeper

All Known Implementing Classes:
ShortTimer, Timer
public interface TimeKeeper

This defines the timer interface. This interface regulates the interface that shall be possessed by a timer implemented class.

Method Summary
 void dispose()
          This disposes of the timer.
 int getResolution()
          This obtains the timer resolution.
 void start()
          This starts the timer.
 void stop()
          This stops the timer.
 

Method Detail

getResolution

public int getResolution()
This obtains the timer resolution. The timer resolution is the minimum interval from the occurrence of one timer event to the next occurrence. This time interval varies from system to system.

Returns:
The timer resolution in a unit of milliseconds.

start

public void start()
This starts the timer.

stop

public void stop()
This stops the timer.

dispose

public void dispose()
This disposes of the timer.
